Singer-songwriters are musicians who write , compose , and perform their own musical material , including lyrics and melodies . In music , an arrangement is a musical reconceptualization of a previously composed work . A composer ( Latin compono ; literally " one who puts together " ) is a person who creates or writes music , which can be vocal music ( for a singer or choir ) , instrumental music ( e.g. , for solo piano , string quartet , wind quintet or orchestra ) or music which combines both instruments and voices ( e.g. , opera or art song , which is a singer accompanied by a pianist ) .
